code: public void suspend() throws Exception {     if (!context.getStatus().isStarted()) {         throw new IllegalArgumentException("CamelContext is not started").     }     context.getRouteController().suspendRoute(getRouteId()). }

public void suspend(long timeout) throws Exception {     if (!context.getStatus().isStarted()) {         throw new IllegalArgumentException("CamelContext is not started").     }     context.getRouteController().suspendRoute(getRouteId(), timeout, TimeUnit.SECONDS). }

public void resume() throws Exception {     if (!context.getStatus().isStarted()) {         throw new IllegalArgumentException("CamelContext is not started").     }     context.getRouteController().resumeRoute(getRouteId()). }
